DataFix.FixSQL: update XXHR.xxhr_order_header set order_total = 250 where order_id = 1;
DataFix.BackupSQL: create table xxhr.xxhr_order_header_bkp as (select * from xxhr.xxhr_order_header)

Validation.Description: Make sure order_header total_price is equal to the line_item total
Validation.ValidationSQL: select case when o.order_total = l.line_item_total then 1 when o.order_total <> l.line_item_total then 0 end as validation from (select order_id, order_total from xxhr.xxhr_order_header where order_id = 1) o, (select order_id, sum(unit_price * quantity) as line_item_total from XXHR.xxhr_order_items where order_id = 1 group by order_id) l where o.order_id = l.order_id
